message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $850,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $900,000.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to both of us. Let's work together to close this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still looking to save more. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I'm still holding firm on my previous offer of $900,000.  I know the product is worth more to you, and I'm confident this price will be a win for both of us. Let's work this out, I'm open to discussing it further.
I understand you're holding firm, but I'm still not comfortable with $900,000. I'm willing to pay $880,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not able to go lower than $890,000. This is a significant compromise on my part, and I'm hoping you'll see the value in this offer. Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $890,000. I'm willing to pay $870,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
